entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hornepayne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:56 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
